default.say: I hear you. I am here.
default.doStep: Get low, soften your voice, and hold one clear boundary.
default.ifEscalates: Use fewer words, stay close, and focus on safety.

default.say: I am here. I will help keep everyone safe.
default.doStep: Move breakable items aside and give arm's-length space.
default.ifEscalates: Give more space, use fewer words, and repeat one calm line.

default.say: Stop. I will help keep your body safe.
default.doStep: Block exits and guide to a safer spot.
default.ifEscalates: Keep your body between danger and child, then call a support person if needed.

default.say: You can feel upset. The boundary stays the same.
default.doStep: Offer one small choice within the limit.
default.ifEscalates: Repeat the limit once, then stay nearby and quiet.

default.say: You are safe. We can take a reset break.
default.doStep: Move to a quieter nearby spot.
default.ifEscalates: Leave this task for now and focus on calming first.

default.say: I need thirty seconds to steady myself.
default.doStep: Place child in a safe spot, take ten slow breaths, then return.
default.ifEscalates: Pause the plan and lower expectations for this moment.

default.say: Transition time. I will help your body shift.
default.doStep: Give one short cue, then guide the first step.
default.ifEscalates: Return briefly to calm, then retry one small step.

default.say: Bedtime now, I will help you settle.
default.doStep: Route to Sleep Tonight and start the runner.
default.ifEscalates: Use sleep runner escalation rule only.
